events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of May 1st involving rear-end collision on Main Street.
The claim was reviewed and correctly categorised as an Auto Accident due to the involvement of a personal vehicle in a collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to this case to handle all communication and coordinate the claim process effectively.
The insurance company sent an acknowledgment to the claimant confirming receipt of the accident claim and outlining next steps.
Requested the claimant to submit detailed photographs of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates for assessment.
Received all requested documents from the claimant, including accident photos, the official police report, and an initial repair estimate.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence to verify the circumstances of the car accident and assess liability.
Investigation confirmed the accident details as reported with no conflicting information, validating the legitimacy of the claim.
A settlement offer was drafted based on repair costs and policy coverage limits to ensure fair compensation for the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt and clear communication from the agent.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance adjuster following the claimant’s acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was processed and issued to the claimant’s designated bank account.
The claim was officially closed after payment was confirmed received and no further action was required from the claimant.
All case files and documentation relating to this auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
